tool_description: Analyzes citation patterns and networks to identify influential researchers and their interconnections within a field.

author_ids.description: List of author identifiers to analyze

analysis_depth.description: Degrees of separation to analyze in citation network

error_messages: Invalid author IDs: Ensure all provided author identifiers exist in the database.
Analysis depth out of range: Must be between 1 and 5 degrees of separation.
Network too large: Reduce the number of authors or analysis depth for computational feasibility.
usage: Provide author_ids to analyze their citation networks. Optionally set analysis_depth to control how many degrees of citation relationships to explore.

influence_scores.description: Numerical influence scores for each analyzed author

collaboration_strength.description: Network connectivity scores indicating collaboration patterns

network_summary.description: Overview of the citation network structure and key findings
